directions: Process the 'chicken' in a food processor and then transfer it to a medium mixing bowl.  Run the celery, onion and green pepper through the processor.  Add the vegetables to the mixing bowl and stir in the eggs, stuffing, salt and pepper; mix well.  Form into patties.
In a medium frying pan heat olive oil over medium-high heat.  Fry patties on each side until browned.
ingredients: 1 (12.5 ounce) can vegetarian fried chicken (e.g., FriChik)
½ cup dry bread stuffing mix
title: Vegetarian Faux Chicken Patties
